00103 static bool WaitForEvents(const std::vector<IEvent*>& events) {
00104   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < events.size(); i++) {
00105     if (events[i]->Wait() == false) {
00106       return false;
00107     }
00108   }
00109   return true;
00110 }
